{"step_by_step_thinking": "Universal ProTaper retreatment files are used in endodontics to remove filling materials from root canals during retreatment procedures. The D1, D2, and D3 files are all part of the ProTaper Universal retreatment system. However, only the D1 file has an end cutting tip. The D2 and D3 files have side cutting tips.", "answer_choice": "A"}
